title: Newly Built House At Katugastota For Sale
details:
3 stories House with all facilities, Roof level to be completed
Fully tiled, Hot water, Beautiful mount view
6 Km to Kandy
2 Km to Katugastota town
50m to Kandy Kurunegala main road
Clear deeds and approved building plan
Garbage collecting facility.
For viewing please feel free to call us, and Inspections can be done only on weekends and holidays. Price Can be negotiable after site inspection. Any offers are also welcome.
